column1: academy award,PC,Lardner shared an Academy Award for best original screenplay with Michael Kanin in 1942 for Woman of the Year,Academy Award winner Whoopi Goldberg (Ghost) stars as a sassy lounge singer forced to hide in a quiet convent.,"Bette Davis, Ernest Hall and Victor Buono received Academy Award nominations, while Norma Koch took home an Oscar for the costume design.",award,,,,,,,,
